titles.title: Providing for a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 5771.

action.text: Mr. Camp asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/10/2014--Passed House without amendment. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to amend the enrollment of H.R.5771 to cite Division B of such Act as the Stephen Beck, Jr., Achieving a Better Life Experience Act of 2014 or the Stephen Beck, Jr., ABLE Act of 2014.
